lead_paragraph: With the Chicago Cubs in desperate need of a win, manager Joe Maddon put Jason Heyward in right field for Game 4 of the World Series on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Slumping Jason Heyward Gets 1st World Series Start for Cubs
headline.main: Slumping Jason Heyward Gets 1st World Series Start for Cubs

snippet: With the Chicago Cubs in desperate need of a win, manager Joe Maddon put Jason Heyward in right field for Game 4 of the World Series on Saturday night....
